Text: Seeding max. Internet kinda fucked right now so sorry if you're one of the first. (^-^)
Hi, after i install this can i play multiplayer with X fire?
You will be able to, yes. Just have to make sure you use one of the private servers you add to your favorites.

Look at the  instructions above. They tell you the websites you can find servers at.
